last_episode_to_air.name: Dhansukh Dilemma
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lemont and Hyder try to transform their taxi into a hidden-camera gold mine. Dhansukh wants to change Hasmukh's business from IT to peanut butter.

name: Brown Nation
overview: Hasmukh operates a small IT Consulting company "Shree Ganesh Computers Limited Inc" in Queens, NY. Staffed by a disinterested and lazy cast of characters, his business flounders. His home life is not much better. His wife Dimple, a frustrated and jobless artist, complains constantly about not having enough time to explore her creativity because of the demands of taking care of her dog, Bobby. Hasmukh tries desperately to balance his work and family, but neither seem to have his best interest at heart.

episodes.name: Farewell Papaji
episodes.overview: Hasmukh looks forward to Papaji finally returning home, but with a beeping heart monitor, lost luggage and an inappropriate gift, it may not happen.

episodes.name: The New Hire
episodes.overview: Dimple decides to make a career change and become a painter. Hasmukh takes Bobby to the office on the same day he hires a new office manager.

episodes.name: The Video Conference
episodes.overview: Hasmukh tries to cut Matt's extravagant travel plans by having Balan arrange a video conference call with new clients. Dimple wants a vacation.

episodes.name: Love & Death
episodes.overview: Hasmukh's employees are developing an internet dating site that entices Balan. Hyder tries to convince Hasmukh to partner in a funeral home business.

episodes.name: The Art of Loving
episodes.overview: Dimple wants Hasmukh to follow a calming spiritual path, but he's consumed by a potential lawsuit. Balan thinks his favorite soap opera is about him.

episodes.name: I'm a SupaStar
episodes.overview: Hyder convinces Hasmukh to take up golf as a way to improve business, but Hasmukh doesn't know a club from a bat. Dimple lands a music video job.

episodes.name: The 5 Year Anniversary
episodes.overview: On their wedding anniversary, Hasmukh has to convince Dimple that his Atlantic City, New Jersey, IT conference is a romantic getaway.

episodes.name: Fire Matt
episodes.overview: Hyder will do anything to get back together with Samantha. Dimple's new modeling gig is an unfortunate success. Hasmukh can't seem to fire Matt.

episodes.name: Baby Issue
episodes.overview: While Papaji dreams of having a grandchild, Hasmukh deals with his own delicate condition. Hyder takes drastic measures to put his engagement on hold.

episodes.name: Dhansukh Dilemma
episodes.overview: Lemont and Hyder try to transform their taxi into a hidden-camera gold mine. Dhansukh wants to change Hasmukh's business from IT to peanut butter.
